verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> were passed away <S%G3928><s%> <S%G5627><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> sea <S%G2281><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>, new <S%G2537><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2419><s%>, coming down <S%G2597><s%> <S%G5723><s%> from <S%G575><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, prepared <S%G2090><s%> <S%G5772><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a bride <S%G3565><s%> adorned <S%G2885><s%> <S%G5772><s%> for her <S%G846><s%> husband <S%G435><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> shall wipe away <S%G1813><s%> <S%G5692><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> tears <S%G1144><s%> from <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, neither <S%G3777><s%> sorrow <S%G3997><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> crying <S%G2906><s%>, neither <S%G3777><s%> <S%G3756><s%> shall there be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> any more <S%G2089><s%> pain <S%G4192><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> the former things <S%G4413><s%> are passed away <S%G565><s%> <S%G5627><s%>.

Having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> light <S%G5458><s%> was like <S%G3664><s%> unto a stone <S%G3037><s%> most precious <S%G5093><s%>, even like <S%G5613><s%> a jasper <S%G2393><s%> stone <S%G3037><s%>, clear as crystal <S%G2929><s%> <S%G5723><s%>;
